name: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Lost and Damned
name_original: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Lost and Damned
description:
Grand Theft Auto IV: The Lost and Damned is an action game developed by Rockstar North. It came out on 17-02-2009. It was published by Rockstar Games. On review aggregator Metacritic, Grand Theft Auto IV: The Lost and Damned has a score of 89. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Grand Theft Auto IV: The Lost and Damned on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
Leslie Benzies produced the game. It was scored by Stuart Hart.
